sourcesContent:
import cb from '../../Image/coxsbazar.png'
import sj from '../../Image/Sajek.png'
import sb from '../../Image/sundorbon.png'
import sm from '../../Image/Sreemongol.png'

import cbh1 from '../../Image/royaltulip.jpg'
import cbh2 from '../../Image/saymon.jpeg'
import cbh3 from '../../Image/coxtoday.jpg'

import smh1 from '../../Image/Balishira.jpg'
import smh2 from '../../Image/Inn.jpg'
import smh3 from '../../Image/Jungle.jpg'

import sjh1 from '../../Image/rungrang.jpg'
import sjh2 from '../../Image/laxman.jpg'
import sjh3 from '../../Image/meghpunji.jpg'

import sbh1 from '../../Image/sundarban1.jpg'
import sbh2 from '../../Image/sundarban2.jpg'
import sbh3 from '../../Image/sundarban3.jpg'


const destinationData =
    [
        {
            key: 'CB',
            name: "COX'S BAZAR",
            description: "Cox's Bazar is a city, fishing port, tourism centre and district headquarters in southeastern Bangladesh. It is famous mostly for its long natural sandy beach, and it ...",
            details: 'Cox’s Bazar is a town on the southeast coast of Bangladesh.It’s known for its very long, sandy beachfront, stretching from Sea Beach in the north to Kolatoli Beach in the south. Aggameda Khyang monastery is home to bronze statues and centuries-old Buddhist manuscripts. South of town, the tropical rainforest of Himchari National Park has waterfalls and many birds. North, sea turtles breed on nearby Sonadia Island.',
            image: cb,
            hotels: [
                {
                    id:"CBH1",
                    name: "Hotel Sea Crown",
                    place: "Jaliapalong, Inani, Ukhia, Cox's Bazar, 4750 Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh",
                    details:"Hotel Sea Crown.",
                    image: cbh1,
                    rating: 4.6,
                    ratingUser:80,
                    price:80,
                    
                },
                {
                    id:"CBH2",
                    name: "Sayeman Beach Resort",
                    place: "Marine Drive, Road, Cox's Bazar 4700",
                    details:"Sayeman Beach Resort.",
                    image: cbh2,
                    rating: 4.9,
                    ratingUser:67,
                    price:120,
                },
                {
                    id:"CBH3",
                    name: "Hotel The Cox Today",
                    place: "Plot-7, Road-02 Hotel Motel Zone, Kolatoly Road Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh",
                    details:"Hotel The Cox Today.",
                    image: cbh3,
                    rating: 4.7,
                    ratingUser:88,
                    price:95,
                }
            ],
        },
        {
            key: 'BDSB1',
            name: "Sundarbans",
            description: "The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal. It spans from ...",
            details: "The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal. It spans from the Hooghly River in India's state of West Bengal to the Baleswar River in Bangladesh.",
            image: sb,
            hotels: [
                {
                    id:"CBHT1",
                    name: "Royal Sundarban",
                    place: "Sundarban, Bangladesh",
                    details:"The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal. It spans from the Hooghly River in India's state of West Bengal to the Baleswar River in Bangladesh.",
                    image: sbh1,
                    rating: 4.6,
                    ratingUser:15,
                    price:20,
                    
                },
                {
                    id:"CBHT2",
                    name: "Jungle Palace",
                    place: "Sundarban, Bangladesh",
                    details:"The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal. It spans from the Hooghly River in India's state of West Bengal to the Baleswar River in Bangladesh.",
                    image: sbh2,
                    rating: 4.1,
                    ratingUser:27,
                    price:25,
                },
                {
                    id:"CBHT3",
                    name: "Hotel Sundarban",
                    place: "Sundarban, Bangladesh",
                    details:"The Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal. It spans from the Hooghly River in India's state of West Bengal to the Baleswar River in Bangladesh.",
                    image: sbh3,
                    rating: 4.3,
                    ratingUser:38,
                    price:45,
                }
            ],
        },
        {
            key: 'BDSJ1',
            name: "SAJEK",
            description: "Sajek Valley - সাজেক ভ্যালি / মেঘের উপত্যকায় জীবন is an emerging tourist spot in Bangladesh situated among the hills of the ...",
            details: "Sajek valley is known for its natural environment and is surrounded by mountains, dense forest, and grassland hill tracks. Many small rivers flow through the mountains among which the Kachalong and the Machalong are notable. On the way to Sajek valley, one has to cross the Mayni range and the Mayni river. The road to Sajek has high peaks and falls",
            image: sj,
            hotels: [
                {
                    id:"SJHT1",
                    name: "Resort RungRang",
                    place: "Sajek Valley Near Army Resort, 4590 Māhmuam, Bangladesh ",
                    details:"Situated in Māhmuam, Resort RungRang - Sajek features accommodation with private balconies. The hotel has family rooms.",
                    image: sjh1,
                    rating: 4.5,
                    ratingUser:180,
                    price:62,
                    
                },
                {
                    id:"SJHT2",
                    name: "Laxman Cottage",
                    place: "Sajek Valley, Bangladesh",
                    details:"After fifty years of glorious past, Sayeman Beach Resort revives its famed legacy of comfort, elegance and impeccable service.",
                    image: sjh2,
                    rating: 4.2,
                    ratingUser:167,
                    price:57,
                },
                {
                    id:"SJHT3",
                    name: "Megh Punji",
                    place: "Sajek Valley Near Army Resort, 4590 Māhmuam, Bangladesh",
                    details:"Hotel The Cox Today is a privately owned 5 Star Standard Luxury Hotel in Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh. It is situated in an attractive location of Kolatoli Road, Cox's Bazar which is only 5 minutes drive form the Cox's Bazar Airport. It is a place of choice of most of the corporate executives, foreigners, newly married couples, and for those who prefer to stay in luxury with stunning view of The 'Bay of Bengal'.",
                    image: sjh3,
                    rating: 4.8,
                    ratingUser:188,
                    price:67,
                }
            ],
        },
        {
            key: 'BDSM1',
            name: "SREEMANGAL",
            description: "It is said the name Sreemangal (or Srimangal) is named after Sri Das and Mangal Das; two brothers who settled on the banks of the Hail Haor. A copper plate of ...",
            details: "It is said the name Sreemangal (or Srimangal) is named after Sri Das and Mangal Das; two brothers who settled on the banks of the Hail Haor. A copper plate of Raja Marundanath from the 11th century was found in Kalapur",
            image: sm,
            hotels: [
                {
                    id:"SMHT1",
                    name: "Balishira Resort Ltd.",
                    place: "Ispahani Road, Radhanagar, 3210 Sreemangal, Bangladesh",
                    details:"Set in Sreemangal, Balishira Resort Ltd. Features 3-star accommodation with private balconies. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers an indoor pool, a garden and rooms with river views.",
                    image: smh1,
                    rating: 3.9,
                    ratingUser:38,
                    price:35,
                    
                },
                {
                    id:"SMHT2",
                    name: "Sreemangal Inn Hotel & Restauran",
                    place: "Habigonj Road, Sreemangal, 3210 Sreemangal, Bangladesh",
                    details:"Sreemangal Inn Hotel & Restaurant offers air-conditioned accommodation in Sreemangal. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi. The accommodation features room service, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests.",
                    image: smh2,
                    rating: 4.2,
                    ratingUser:52,
                    price:20,
                },
                {
                    id:"SMHT3",
                    name: "Jungle cottage",
                    place: "dolu bari Jungle cottage, 3210 Sreemangal, Bangladesh",
                    details:"All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower.",
                    image: smh3,
                    rating: 4.5,
                    ratingUser:48,
                    price:55,
                }
            ],
        }
    ]

export default destinationData;
